Name: RacetronicVR
About the game: Hovercar racing, laser shooting, fully motion controlled madness! RacetronicVR is a time trail racing game where you shoot obstacles and powerups, built exclusively for VR. Steer with one hand and shoot with the other. VR racing as it should be: with motion controllers. 3 galactic tracks with a bevy of obstacles, shortcuts, power ups and secrets keep the good times racing. Local leader boards for track times, become the fastest racer in the galaxy. Can cause VR motion sickness for some people, but hey, it's free :D Thanks for playing, I hope you enjoy!
